markdown:
<title level="1" right="Action">[Pick at the Meat](/Actions.aspx?ID=1270) <actions string="Single Action" /></title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #181: Zombie Feast](/Sources.aspx?ID=139) pg. 78</row>

**Requirements** The animal companion's last action was a successful jaws Strike.

</column>

---

Your bird picks at the wound it just created. The target of its jaws Strike takes 1d8 [bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29), or 2d8 bleed damage if the bird is specialized.
name: Pick at the Meat
requirement: The animal companion's last action was a successful jaws Strike.
requirement_markdown: The animal companion's last action was a successful jaws Strike.
